website_summaries.verdict: The best chair for the maximum amount of comfort while playing or watching TV.
pros: Folds up to store when not in use
Provides plenty of space for one or two people to sit
cons: Large and awkward to move around the floor

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold shape!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year and a half ago and just got around to writing this review. This chair stinks!! It lost all it's shape within the first month. I bought not for my mom who is petite 120lbs tops!! She wanted a chair to sit by the fireplace and I thougt this would be perfect!!! WRONG!!!! Don't wast your money!,
customer_reviews.author: Rosetta Fraleigh

customer_reviews.title: There is no "chair" shape to this bean bag.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for our sons (there is enough room for two on each chair, as well, so we figured friends could use them when here). Even when the chairs arrived, they did not stand up on their own, as seen in the product's photo. They are essentially bags with beans in them and have little to no "chair" shape. We even went ahead and bought an extra bag of beans to make them stiffer or shape easier. The beans were VERY hard to load in and did nothing to help.
customer_reviews.author: JohnRandall

customer_reviews.title: Terrible chair! It lost its shape within months.
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this, I would have said that it was a nice chair. I could sit on it on the floor, and it held its shape as a chair well. Unfortunately, that lasted only a short time. Now, this chair is a sad, deflated rectangle on the floor. It isn't filled uniformly, so it doesn't even work as a floor cushion to sit on. In short, it is disappointing in every way. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalinde

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: She reads in this corner all the time and just enjoys adjusting it to whatever she’s doing.
customer_reviews.author: Miesha

customer_reviews.title: Photos are misleading
customer_reviews.text: This product looks like it has some support, and can be used as a chair. However, it is nothing but a giant pillow. Think Dog Bed. It was very soft, and looked very durable, but to use it as a chair, you would have had to prop it against the wall. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay upright for long. between 3 and 6 months of use it becomes flat as a pancake.
customer_reviews.author: Tilly Burg

customer_reviews.title: I bought two bean bag chairs like this and one is lime Green and this one ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two bean bag chairs like this and one is lime Green and this one is black I am wondering if there is something wrong with the black one bc it doesn't sit like the lime green one and I feel there is not enough stuff in the black one very poorly made but not understanding the lime green one is good !! The black one is the same not a good product at all
customer_reviews.author: Kar La

customer_reviews.title: ... on this chair and saw that experiences varied from bad to great
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews on this chair and saw that experiences varied from bad to great. I bought this chair as a birthday gift for my 13 year old son to use while playing Xbox. The chair held form for a couple weeks then would no longer sit up and hold its shape. I have to admit I wasn't surprised given the reviews I read actually said this had happened to a number of people, I was more frustrated and disappointed because it was my son's birthday gift and it only lasted 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Go Big Joe
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this chair economically priced compared to other bean bag chairs, but it's also durable and comfortable. I've had the Sumo Lounge in the past and paid over $150 for it. Almost immediately the seams tore away from the stitching, but not Big Joe! Even the beans inside the Big Joe are better. They are larger and last longer. I use this chair daily and love it!
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lounge chair!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lounge chair! It fits perfect for my reading nook under the stairs. I bought the gray color with the geometric pattern. It's firm, so hopefully it holds up well. Idk the longevity of the item, because I just received it. I will update my review in a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: L Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Fun chairs!
customer_reviews.text: The Friends of the Library asked me to order these for the Children's Room in my library. They're great for our reading nook where kids can take a book and read when they want to back away from the frenetic pace of the programming. Kids love these chairs! We also used them during our video game tournament. The teens thought they were great. We will probably get more for our teen room. These chairs were so much more from library supply companies and came with a hefty shipping fee, but ordering them here worked very well! I had them delivered straight to the library. Ms. Kate and the kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Adele P. Puccio

customer_reviews.title: Not worth spending $30 a month to refill
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a present on Christmas Day, and by the time December was over, it was already starting to flatten in the sit area. You can even hear the beads crackling, I have had a bean bag in the past with the small beads and it lasted us a year or more. I don't see spending $30 a month for their UltimaX Beans. There has got to be a better alternative.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a dog bed
customer_reviews.text: We have a 13 year old bassist hound who is starting to have accidents and we’ve had to throw away 2 beds recently that couldn’t be cleaned. This is perfect as the vinyl can be wiped off with 409and paper towels. If it’s a big accident we take it outside and hose it off and go over it with bleach water. Good as new. Surprised pet stores don’t sell something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaw

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these chairs and you feel comfortsble for only two or three weeks. the foam beans inside start to loose density and after three weeks both chairs are flat and deformed. Price is very high for only three weeks of normal use. I don't recomend them at all. Is just waist your money.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Hincapié

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but not impressive
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. The gal sitting in this chair in the photo must be under 5' tall and weigh 95 lbs. My Big Joe didn't have nearly as much 'stuffing' as what you're looking at in the picture - the front has maybe 6" of stuffing for leg support at best. And the back hardly has the rigid support seen here - mine sits at closer to a 45 degree angle, not the 85 degrees you see this gal sitting in. I'm 5'10" and 190# for reference. For the price and the interim solution I needed, it's suitable. But I'd have rather had an old school bean bag chair vs. this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris in the Gig

customer_reviews.title: GRRREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of bad reviews for this product, I was apprehensive about buying it. Arrived in great condition. I had to air it over night to remove the chemical smell. A great addition to my sons playroom. Has held its shape so far but I will update this post if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Mom&Son

customer_reviews.title: Comfy lounger!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy ..teenager boy uses it for sitting around and playing video games. He spilled water on it no problem... fabric is nice and tough.. cleaned it up.. back to playing.. need to fluff ..mush it around.. ready to go.. Easy fun and great price. Another great feature.. the box can be turned into a Castle! My daughter took that box and made it into her home.. she loved it. Now I have a chair and a castle.. great marketing.. what kid does not like a box! And a great lounger!
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, not the worst
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent for what it is, I think I'll be filling mine with memory foam soon enough because the beans (as usual) are compressed after a month of use. Got this for some floor gaming and it hasn't been too bad, construction is good and its easy to clean but for extended use it isn't making the grade. With the beans compressed the way they are it can be difficult to get comfortable in an upright sitting position. Not bad for the price, solid 3 star bordering on 4
customer_reviews.author: Megadime

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy beanbag chair
customer_reviews.text: I really love this beanbag chair! It's big enough for an adult to sit comfortably in and it's curved to keep you sitting upright! The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it did "deflate" pretty quickly. The beans inside must be getting squished from my kids messing around on it and it already needs a refill of beans.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Suekawa

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 (2 for my kids 1 for me) to sit on when playing video games. After 90 days they have lost 50% or more of their fluff and now just lay flat. Big disappointment, big waste of money. My sons ripped right on the stitching today (95 lb kid).
customer_reviews.author: Sless

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in how little support this chair has. It definitely doesn’t stay in the form as shown in the picture. It always lays down on one side and there’s no way of keeping everything inside the chair proportioned out properly. Everything always tends to settle towards the bottom leaving the back of the chair laying flat. It’s the last one we will be purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Blackmon

customer_reviews.title: 5 months in, so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: These are big! Average size adult can sit with/next to child. My kids ages 9, 8, 7 got them for Christmas and they have held up well so far. Yes they have definitely lost a little shape and body but still very comfy. I fluff them regularly to keep the foam beads inside evenly distributed and I keep them propped up against wall when not in use. Kids LOVE them. I have been strict about no jumping on them etc. They are great for family movie night too! Overall very happy with these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyD

customer_reviews.title: which is perfect! Although it's not as comfortable once you sit ...
customer_reviews.text: It's huge for my tween, which is perfect! Although it's not as comfortable once you sit on it & make a dent on the cushion. It kind of stays that way, which gets a bit uncomfortable after awhile and so you have to constantly shake it to puff it back up to its original shape. Overall, it's another good buy for its worth!
customer_reviews.author: Amazona

customer_reviews.title: Flat as a pancake within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: We barely used this. I bought it for a viewing party so I could let my guests have the comfy chairs. Then it lived in the playroom where my kids sat on it maybe once a week when I let them play video games. Totally flat now, You have to prop it up against the wall or the couch. I guess I'll give it to the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: MPR

customer_reviews.title: Not bad price could be 40 tho.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome works my pit bull jobs on them from time to time has yet to break. Provide excellent comfort when its lead on something. The price could’ve been cheaper do to the way it tends to fall back when you lean back. Needs support in the sides like a racing cock pit seat and it will be on point. I have no issues to complain about yet and if any arise I will update
customer_reviews.author: Truthful Reviews for you !

customer_reviews.title: Great bean bag
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit with my 7 year old. He lays on it and plays his electronics. It has a suede like texture and seems to be of good quality. We haven't had any trouble with beans or anything coming out. I will say it is not as comfortable as I had hoped. The back part where your head lays seems pretty stiff, but over all I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M. Wires

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was so disappointed. I bought this product with teacher grant money for my classroom. Within two weeks the filling inside was worn down and we could no longer use. Th sad part is that we didn’t even sit on everyday. My kids are not that big either. The filling is available to buy but very expensive. So discouraged that I wasted grant money on this product. .
customer_reviews.author: Grace.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Product as pictured and described. I purchased for my nine year old and he loves it! The chair is comfortable, sturdy filling, sturdy cover fabric and light weight making it ideal for various seating arrangements in our home (from playing games with his brother in his room or his brother's room to bringing it to our den to augment seating for a movie or game night when extended family and friends come over). The chair can also support a small adult. I think anyone 150 lbs and under or 67" and under may find this chair comfortable as well... perhaps.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied...
customer_reviews.text: I think I would really enjoy it but unfortunately I received a lime green chair similar to the Big Joe Roma chair. It did not come with a packaging slip. Please help. See photo below.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Dobson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing chair. Very comfortable and easy to lay down or conform to sit up comfortably. The fabric is perfect to clean if anything spills. The chair came stuffed pretty full. I love the option to add or remove stuffing. I purchased this for my nephew and he wouldn't get up from the chair because he loved it so much. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after 2.5 months of use!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this chair. Very comfortable, easy to adjust to different sitting positions, whether we wanted to lean back or sit up more. Only downfall is that after 2.5 months the chair has ripped along the seem and is leaking all the stuffing. For the money I thought he would get a little more life out of it. Mind you my son is young and under 100 pounds so it wasn't like some adult was just bouncing around on it. Very disappointing. UPDATE: It just keeps ripping along the same seem. Chair is useless now.
customer_reviews.author: Jason N. Decarmen

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but not “chair shaped” or supportive
customer_reviews.text: My teen likes this for playing video games- but she doesn’t play long or often. It’s not supportive at all- but very comfortable and soft. She just wishes it were filled a bit more to give it more structure. It’s very much a flat looking bean bag, in other words, and we thought it would have just a bit more shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Update!!!!!  This chair SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bean bag alternative for a child. Not constructed to withstand the weight of an adult with consistent use.
customer_reviews.author: Imaginary Friend

customer_reviews.title: A complete scam
customer_reviews.text: After a few months, the whole volume has completely evaporated. The bean bag chair now looks nothing like the picture on the product page. it is as if all the filling has evaporated.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia Genov

customer_reviews.title: It is collapsing, but it was expected.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this chair. It is starting to collapse. It's only been a month since we've had it. I totally plan on filling it with memory foam one it completely fails. So, it's what we needed, just with they could put a better fill in it. That would make it all better.
customer_reviews.author: wredwritinghood

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy for 2 weeks and now it’s flat. And it was being used for little kids. Should not have flattened already within 3weeks
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay poofy like a bean bag SHOULD!
customer_reviews.text: About a week after having this beam bag, it has gone completely flat. It already needs new filling. Such a disappointment. Only thing good was the box ciuld be made into a castle. Son loved that part. Just wish his bean bag was still inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & comfortable support - great for reading / lounging!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I use the chair for reading and love how easy it is to adjust, as well as the fact that it will also hold its shape and position pretty well. When I first got the box I thought it was empty because of how light this is. I frankly think it's even better than the traditional bean bag chairs that were much heavier. I recommend this 100% and would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie R

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt last long.
customer_reviews.text: Only two months old and its flat. Do not recommend. Kids still like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Buy some large pillows instead.
customer_reviews.text: First, the young lady in the photo must be 4’8” tall. These “bean” bag type chairs, regardless of brand go flat in no time flat. Mine looks like an extra large and not so soft dog bed after maybe a dozen times a kid has sat on it. I’ve tried this one for indoors for my grandkids and another brand for swimming pool. They are all duds. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: JLR, Bastrop, TX

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that when I opened the box and saw this thing, I was disappointed. However, once I figured out it's orientation, and sat down in it, I was really surprised. My biggest surprise is how much back support it provided even though it doesn't have a hard back. I just sit down and wiggle a bit and it's very comfortable even for a whole movie.
customer_reviews.author: JR Dallas

customer_reviews.title: A must for kids and adults alike.
customer_reviews.text: To say my kid loves this would be an understatement. Very comfortable, very light. My 11 and 9 yo can easily move this from room to room. Spacious and easy to clean! Shape can be adjusted slightly for comfort and angle. I’m 5’6 and it’s super comfortable for me as well! Highly recommend worth the $
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Seams tearing. Beads coming out in less than 15 days
customer_reviews.text: I got this on the 13th of August and today and today is the 29th. The seams have already begun to come out. And the beads are coming out of it . I don't have kids, I am not overweight and I don't jump on my furniture. Oh and here is the kicker... I had to pay for my own shipping to return the product. Thanks a lot Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Nikhil Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son was expecting it to sit upright on its own. He uses it in our basement and just props it up against the wall. If u aren’t planning on propping it up against something u probably won’t like it. It’s very good quality and serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lisonbee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Hold Its Shape for Long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas as a game chair for when he plays PS4. The shape shown in the picture does not hold up, and the chair now looks like a rectangle bean bag cushion on the floor. Comfortable to sit on, but no back support, and not why I bought it. And no, my husband is not overweight, and nowhere close. I have also tried to rearrange the stuffing. For the price I paid, I am disappointed. Just don't expect much back support if you purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Waltman

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this chair for camping and it’s super comfortable! Very easy and light to fold up and take wherever. It’s good quality material and a great value for the buy! Our family fights over who can sit in this, would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Prine

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money👎
customer_reviews.text: They replaced the first one because it went flat in 2 weeks . The one they sent is the same now. It's a flat blanket, I'm sure I can buy more filling. But the whole point of buying a almost $60 product is so it can last at least 6 months. Don't buy not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Aurelio Saldivar

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for my Daughters and they completely broke down, lost shape and collapsed, in less than 60 Days. I do not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Speicher

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a comfy reading chair to go in my husband's office and this was exactly what I was looking for! Although it took a lot longer than expected to arrive (ordered in mid-Nov) I was very happy with it once we got it!
customer_reviews.author: MDB0673

customer_reviews.title: Not that great. Will become flat in sometime.
customer_reviews.text: After using this for nearly 15days i decided to write this review. I have been using this big joe bean chair for not more than 1-2hrs a day and i weight around 135-140pounds but i see it becoming flat every single day. Its good for the cost but you get what you pay for. So not a great choice. Better invest in something more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Disha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for her dorm room!
customer_reviews.text: This was the PERFECT addition to our daughter's dorm/barracks room. She is a ROTC cadet at a military college and could not lay on her rack (on her bunk) during the day, or sit on it to do HW. We got her this chair and it fits perfectly into her room and gives her a more comfortable place to study with her laptop on her lap, or just rest between classes when she can't sit or lay on her bed. Really is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: hisdwarf

customer_reviews.title: We like it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to the old fashioned bean bag chair. My only complaint is that it stopped sitting up on its own about three days after my six year old began using it. It now lays down like a bed unless it is leaning agains a wall or the couch.
customer_reviews.author: PaulaWalla

customer_reviews.title: Needs more stuffing
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great if it was stuffed a bit more to keep the comfort of it. It looses the firmness pretty quickly. But it's really a nice bean bag just need more stuffing then it would really live up to it's name "Big Joe"
customer_reviews.author: Princess simmons

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my teenagers room. Does need a lil more filling.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair we will see how it holds up
customer_reviews.text: I like this chair but I am worried how it will hold up. The box had several pellets loose in the box and the zippers were open slightly, they were hard to close due to pulls missing.
customer_reviews.author: deb n

customer_reviews.title: Not your average bean bag...
customer_reviews.text: This chair was BETTER than expected! I honestly thought it would be teeny weeny but it is more like the name BIG JOE!! My son is 6''2" close to 300lb and he sat comfortably in it and thought it was a perfect alternative to just sitting on pillows on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Quirky but Cute

customer_reviews.title: You need this chair in your life...
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair so much. It’s the perfect size, super comfortable and it’s not that heavy so I feel like you could take it with you places if you wanted. I feel like I could fall asleep on it. Definitely good if you’re a gamer!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryfender13

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for 3 Months or Less
customer_reviews.text: At first I would have given this a 5 star review because it was amazing. You could sit in the chair and it actually had back support and it was really comfortable. But in 3 months this thing is as flat as the floor. Might as well just be sitting on the floor at this point. Super disappointed in the lasting quality, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K

customer_reviews.title: Great cover with short lived beads
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 of these for my classroom. They work great but the beads get crushed down really fast. The material om the outside is extremely durable. I have had some bags for 4 years already.
customer_reviews.author: maria regner

customer_reviews.title: Give Big Joe's a high five for its ecological honoring!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm for me. Not a gamer. But I honor it with the knowledge knowing its not memory foam and other envirorment unfriendly materials. Works best stacked against something sturdy. It's really quite a little wonder!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it's good for children under a 100 pounds
customer_reviews.text: Chairs were great for the 1st month then I had the refill with beans after another month the whole chair flattening out very uncomfortable went to put new beans in it and now I can't get the zippers down The zippers are part metal and part plastic you can only get one use out of them Complete waste of money one ever trust buying another beanbag chair again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Fries

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable but cheaply sewn seams.
customer_reviews.text: This bean bag chair WAS the most comfortable thing I have ever sat it but the seams popped and now it no longer has the same shape. It had wonderful lumbar support, it was perfect just cheaply sewn. I am a small woman and just sitting in it ruined it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Big and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I thought but that’s a good thing! Bought this for a 12 year old and she loves it, so comfy! Even adults want to sit on it because it’s so nice, might buy another one for another part of the house LOL very pleased with this product, it’s light enough to carry but big enough to have room. My dog even liked laying on this lol
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Comfy chair
customer_reviews.text: Great chair. More comfortable than I expected. Only down fall is than you definitely need to restuff it to get that oomph back. Using memory foam stuffing adds and awesome touch along with the beads. Also I wish it was about 2feet longer especially since we are more legs than torso.lol
customer_reviews.author: Tisha

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay upright
customer_reviews.text: It does not stay upright like it shows... it's a bean bag and will go flat and stay that way... you have to lean it against something in order for it to stay upright...
customer_reviews.author: Tess Ann

customer_reviews.title: Went flat too quick
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for daughter to use while gaming and went flat and I searching for a different filler. i just read another review saying don't purchase if sold by Amazon and that its just a Big Joe cover with shreds of everything inside. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: CandyBarBrown

customer_reviews.title: Durable. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent for small media rooms. We bought two and use them for grandkids to watch movies. Back support to sit upright is subjectable to what is pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed it
customer_reviews.text: Was a perfect birthday gift for my granddaughter (7 years old) until her mother started using it all the time (28 years old) and her younger brother (1 year old). So, I guess I know what I'm getting each of them for their next birthdays. Surprisingly comfortable even for me, and I'm not small.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Harris

customer_reviews.title: when they came they had a very comfortable loft and held the shape of a chair (more ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these in the beginning of December 2016, when they came they had a very comfortable loft and held the shape of a chair (more or less as shown in the picture). Here we are the middle of February 2017 and these may as well be half full mats of styrofoam beans. They did not hold any shape, have no support, lay completely flat and are useless unless you have a wall behind you for support. These will not last for more than a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Both of my children got the Big Joe chairs from “Santa” this year. The chair is pretty big and can easily accommodate the average sized adult. The material is very durable and cleaning is a breeze. My son is a gamer and this is the perfect chair for him. The only downside is that the material itself is not that comfortable. It’s a bit stiff and can get a little chilly. We just put a blanket on it before sitting and problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf2

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is under filled and provides no support to sit unless you prop it up against a wall and duck tape it to the wall so you don't slide. I am returning this immediately. Don't waste your time. The beads will be flat within 2 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Gonzales Green

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these in January. Right away one of them ripped open in a spot. I sowed it together even though my husband told me to just return it and get my money back. I liked the design and decided to keep. Well, that was a mistake. Months later both chairs keep ripping in the seams and I keep sowing them. I paid a lot of money for them and if I can get my money back I would love to return them. They are in my basement, my boys barely use them cause of the rips. Do not buy, it’s not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: daniela

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have, for all ages!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chair! I got it for my 9 year old daughter for Christmas, and I think I've used it much more than her. It's so comfortable, lightweight, durable material that cleans up easily with just a damp cloth, and its's incredible versatile! Plus, you can't beat the price!! Now I just need to convince my husband that we really do need a 2nd one in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Big Joe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soft chair for my husband for gaming. The base is pretty low but overall it’s comfortable. We used not over one hour every day, but after 2 month, I found out it is not as firm as before. And the other thing is you always have to find a extra space for this giant soft chair. But my kids love it and used it as a daybed.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: They do NOT hold up.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these chairs for a game room we did for our two sons at Christmas time. It is now April and both chairs are almost useless. I will attempt to sew the holes to lengthen the life of these chairs even a little bit, but do not purchase these chairs unless you want to have to repurchase in less than 6 mo time. Anywhere needle and thread was put through the softer fabric underside, the fabric is unraveling...so even sewing will only be a temporary fix. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rizza Roe

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing in the world
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing in the world. I'm 5'7" and 160 lbs- I thought for sure that the back would flop down because of lack of support, and it holds up quite well! It is filled quite nicely. And super comfy. Seems to be a pretty durable material- which is nice, because I have a new puppy who has managed to rip up everything I love. So far so good!!!
customer_reviews.author: beverly russell

customer_reviews.title: Not for people with any back or posture issues
customer_reviews.text: Size is big enough for a large adult. It has horrible lower back support so a small pillow must be used with this. Color as pictured. Extremely lightweight. For the price and size it was worth the cost of a small extra pillow to me. My toddler uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Buttons

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: Received this chair as a gift for Christmas and I already have a hole in the side of the chair. I'm ok with having to refill the chair with more beans once it flattens out but I find it unacceptable that the craftsmanship for Big Joe is lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my son. He loved it!! So light. I thought maybe they forgot to put it in the box when it arrived!! Haha!! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Marti Krisle

customer_reviews.title: Nice for now
customer_reviews.text: It’s good big and comfy. The underside is super thin material and I question how long it’ll last
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item shipped
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these bean bag chairs. Two bean bag chairs arrived and 1 regular bean bag. It was was even the wrong color. The item is a Christmas present and I can't return it now since Christmas is tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: JamesL

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & fits over 6’3 tall
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, we use this car daily to sit on and watch Tv, talk in the living room, play games, etc. Comfortable and sits up slightly in the back, enough as a pillow. My fiancé is 6’3 and he even fits well on this, he uses it the most.
customer_reviews.author: Halley

customer_reviews.title: Love the floor chair
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, use it to be closer to the floor for my grand daughter. Easy to get up and down. It dose have to be up against something. I would get another if the were available.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Goes flat too fast
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about 6 months or so. It's now so flat it's uncomfortable to sit on. Kinda bummed it only last that long. Guess I will have to buy more beans. :( And the only people who sat on it were my 2 sons ages 9 and 10. So it wasn't that a heavy adult used it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: mamabear04

customer_reviews.title: Even better than described!
customer_reviews.text: It looks even better in person! And the quality has exceeded my expectations! My son is autistic and most sensory related items I purchase don’t have a long life. This is amazing! I’m buying one for my other son as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Mathey

customer_reviews.title: If you looking to save money don't get this
customer_reviews.text: So after a while using this chair, I must say that they are cute and comfortable at the beginning, but if you are going to really use them be aware that you have to refill them with new beans every 2-3 months and they are not cheap, I gave up on and just bought the kids a small sofa for their room and I which I knew this from the get go I would have never buy them as the whole idea was to save money. Though they arrived on time and as long as they full they look and feel nice.
customer_reviews.author: G16

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for two weeks I’m already Duct tape
customer_reviews.text: After two week already sprang a leak I have to use duct tape to hold it together can’t even tape it together just falls apat
customer_reviews.author: beatrice

customer_reviews.title: It is only good for short amount of time.
customer_reviews.text: The chair was great when I got it, but after about a month, all the filling is crashed and the chair is something you cannot describe what it is any more...maybe like a half sized futon? It definitely needs to be refilled with more filling if I want to use it as a chair again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Hue

customer_reviews.title: Not a Bad Chair, But Not Perfect
customer_reviews.text: You definitely need to buy an extra bag of beans to go with this chair. It comes uncomfortably flat, so trying to sit in it before topping it off isn't very pleasant. Even after refilling, it 'deflates' again rather quickly. The fabric used to make it is pretty durable and is water resistant, but there are two panels on the bottom that are of softer, flimsier fabric that picks up a lot of dirt. All in all not a bad chair as long as there are extra beans on hand
customer_reviews.author: RaKe

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This chair was a huge hit in my sensory room! They kids absolutely love it! However, much like other Big Joe products it hasn't held up. It has only been in the classroom for a few months (since October) and is already losing its shape. I don't think it will make it past the end of this school year which is pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Ambrosius

customer_reviews.title: Tween + Teen Boys Worthy
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for a lounge-y gaming area for my tween (10yrs) & teen (5'8") sons; kinda knowing 1) they're rough on furniture 2)it's going to be used heavily 3) may be coated in anything from Elmer's glue to chip crumbs, at times. I was hoping these Big Joes could survive, be cleanable, and look a little neater than bean bags. They are everything I hoped for! The guys have been using them for 4 months, and they look like new, and love them. Mom & Dad got the living room back. It's a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: ellestar27

customer_reviews.title: Good, for a month.
customer_reviews.text: The chairs look really good but they lost their shape in a month. Not satisfied at all. On the other hand, you get what you pay for. I would not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Malik

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Just as pictured. My new place is a garden unit and this chair insulates great from the basement floor. I hadn’t read any reviews before buying, I read them after the fact and was disappointed by so many poor reviews however I am soooo pleased. This is a great bag and so lightweight!!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Ruble

customer_reviews.title: Cozy seat or bed!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this chair! It’s definitely big so make sure you have the room. She even sleeps on it some nights! Quality material. Beautiful color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. They were great for the first couple months but one of them is already flat. For the price I paid I expected better quality. I've had other regular bean bags that have not fallen flat this quick.
customer_reviews.author: MLloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this chair! It’s cozy, just the right size, it’s nice looking. I highly recommend this chair! Makes a nice addiction for any space.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Busted open
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with seam busted open. The inside beans falling out. Sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable indeed! My son loves it! Good for the back too and durable material. Value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Kavita Shah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, fantastic color, and perfect size for my teenage son’s room, as an additional lounging area in his room.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Cool and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Yet another gift that I got for my wife that she seemed to really enjoy. You can plop it down anywhere and sit on it or simply lean against it. Even pets love it. It may not be for everyone, but if you're just looking to add some casual seating you should consider it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex G

product_meta.title: Big Joe Roma Chair, Limo Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:Smartmax| Color:Stretch Limo BlackAre you ready to be floored? Our Roma chair lets you get ground-level cozy for watching TV, playing video games, and just lounging about. You’ll get just the support and comfort you want with our Meghan Beans inside—and all the low maintenance You need with tough, easy-to-wipe-down smart max fabric outside. Bold colors and prints make a statement in your space—and Meghan bean refills (sold separately) Make a your Roma chair Sit like new.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Covered in stain-resistant, easy-to-clean smart ax fabric
Filled with Meghan Beans to surround you with comfort on all sides
Double stitched with dual zippers for extra safety and durability
Casual, lightweight seating for dorm rooms, rec rooms, and more

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,581 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 30 day return or replace for manufacturer defect.
specifications.Import Designation: Made in the USA or Imported
